description: Krissy Thorn is a young saucy girl who is often forgetful, inconsiderate, self-centered and a general pain in the ass to those around her, and in particular her husband, Mr. Richard Thorn, a prominent political figure. Mr. Thorn loves his dear wife but is beside himself with her disposition and attitude neither of which are becoming to her position as Mrs. Thorn. In an effort to save their marriage, Mr. Thorn proposes to enroll Krissy in a facility that will help her adjust her behavior. The Hartwood School for Domestic Discipline, owned and operated by Madam Hartwood. Mr. Thorn was told the Hartwood school has an excellent reputation and is just the place to help Krissy with a much needed adjustment. Krissy reluctantly agrees to go along with her husbands wishes, feeling the pressure that something had to change, or her marriage would be on the rocks.
title: HARTWOOD SCHOOL FOR DOMESTIC DISCIPLINE
